com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.feature.features

Class PersonalScoreboardFeature.GlobalScoreboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.scoreboard.AbstractScoreboard
      • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.feature.features.PersonalScoreboardFeature.GlobalScoreboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scoreboard
    Enclosing class:
    PersonalScoreboardFeature

    public class PersonalScoreboardFeature.GlobalScoreboard
extends AbstractScoreboard
    Allows for mass updating of personal scoreboards

      • addLine

        public void addLine(int key,
                    @Nonnull
                    ScoreboardLine line)
        Description copied from interface: Scoreboard
        adds a new line to this scoreboard. the key specifies the position, higher key being higher "rank" on the board
        if there is a line with that key already, it gets overridden!
        Specified by:
        addLine in interface Scoreboard
        Overrides:
        addLine in class AbstractScoreboard
        Parameters:
        key - the position of the line
        line - the line to add
